paper_abstract: In a paper Cheung, Cucker and Pena (in press) [5] that can be seen as the first part of this one, we extended the well-known condition numbers for polyhedral conic systems C (A) Renegar (1994, 1995) [7-9] and W(A)Cheung and Cucker (2001)131 to versions (C) over bar (A) and,(A) that are finite for all input matrices A is an element of R(n x m) In this paper we compare (C) over bar (A) and E(A) with other condition measures for the same problem that are also always finite. (C) 2009 Elsevier Inc. All rights reserved.
paper_title: On strata of degenerate polyhedral cones, II: Relations between condition measures
